description: React component for synchronizing multiple video players side-by-side with shared controls, specifically a MultiCameraSyncView handling two video sources with synchronized playback and scrubbing.

methods.name: MultiCameraSyncView
methods.description: React functional component that renders side-by-side video players with synchronized play, pause, rate, and scrubbing.

methods.name: attach
methods.description: Function to attach a video player to the correct index and set up synchronization event handlers.
